Article Title: Trey Hendrickson: Bengals Cut Ties with Trey Hendrickson to Free Up $16M — Supporting Joe Burrow's Core with Ja'Marr Chase and Tee Higgins
Article Text:
X

Bengals Say Goodbye to Trey Hendrickson Despite His Dominant Season

the

$15M Investment Signals Shift from Defense to Offense

Fans React to the Bengals' Game-Changing Strategy

The Cincinnati Bengals just made a move that has fans scratching their heads — parting ways with their defensive powerhouse Trey Hendrickson and splashing $15 million on a new star, all in the name of protecting Joe Burrow . It’s a bold shift, trading sack stats for quarterback security, and it's got everyone talking.Trey Hendrickson wasn’t just a key part of the Bengals' defense — he wasguy. A relentless pass-rusher, Hendrickson led the league in sacks last season, proving his value week in and week out. His ability to disrupt offenses made him a cornerstone of Cincinnati’s defense. Even when trade rumors started swirling about his future with the team, a prominent quarterback stepped up and publicly backed him, adding weight to the belief that Hendrickson wasn’t going anywhere — or so it seemed.But now? In a stunning turn of events, Hendrickson is out, leaving fans and analysts alike shocked. The Bengals have pivoted in an unexpected direction, signaling a bold shift in their defensive strategy.In place of Hendrickson, the Bengals have invested $15 million in a new player, not to bolster their defense but to fortify the offensive line. The clear motive? Keep Joe Burrow upright.After seasons marred by injuries and constant pressure, it seems Cincinnati is done taking risks with their franchise QB’s health. This isn’t just a trade — it’s a statement. They’re prioritizing Burrow’s protection over defensive dominance.The move has sparked debate among fans and analysts alike. While some understand the logic — a healthy Burrow is essential for playoff dreams — others question the cost of letting a sack leader walk away.Hendrickson’s absence will surely leave a gap in the Bengals’ defense, but the team seems confident that bolstering the offensive line will pay off in the long run.This roster shakeup marks more than just a swap — it’s a recalibration of the Bengals' identity. Defense wins games, but a protected Joe Burrow wins championships. The franchise seems to be betting that keeping their star quarterback safe is the key to long-term success.Now, all eyes are on the 2025 season. Will this gamble pay off, or will the Bengals regret trading sacks for security?What’s your take — did the Bengals make the right move to put Burrow’s health above all else?Also read - Fans Rally Behind Tua Tagovailoa After 'Dad Bod' Yacht Photos Go Viral — 'Let the Man Relax
Article Summary: Cincinnati bengals traded defensive star trey hendrickson for $15 million. Hendrickson led the league in sacks last season, proving his value week in and week out. The move has sparked debate among fans and analysts alike. The team seems confident that bolstering the offensive line will pay off in the long run.

Article Title: “Had to insure her money": Travis Hunter and fiancee Leanna Lenee caught in new controversy after recent "surprise" video goes viral
Article Text:
Image via Leanna Lenee/Instagram

Travis Hunter’s Fiancee, Leanna Lenee, Surprises Him But Gets Trolled By Fans For It



Travis Hunter And Leanna Lenee Have Been Victims Of Brutal Trolling And Hate



Travis Hunter, the latest Heisman Trophy winner and one of the top picks for the NFL draft , is back in the news due to his personal life. Travis Hunter and his fiancee, Leanna Lenee , have been brutally trolled in the past, and their new video has raised some eyebrows among their fans. However, the video seems like a sweet surprise from Travis Hunter’s fiancee, Leanna Lenee.Recently, a video of Travis Hunter went viral on X, where he is seen entering his gym as he discusses about what to eat with a friend. The Heisman Trophy winner then spots his fiancee, Leanna Lenee, at the gym and asks her, “Why are you going to the boys’ basket?”Travis Hunter’s fiancee, Leanna Lenee, then reveals that she has his high school trainer with her to surprise him. Travis Hunter’s trainer at Collins High School, Drew Johnson, has played a pretty important part during his initial few days and the happiness on Travis’ face was evident.Travis Hunter immediately hugged his high school trainer, Drew Johnson, as he asked his fiancee, Leanna Lenee, how she planned this surprise. Leanna Lenee says, “I texted him yesterday to come out today”.Travis Hunter says, “That’s tough…”. He then hugs his high school coach again as Drew Johnson tells Travis, “You look like you seen a ghost”.While the video of Travis Hunter’s fiancee, Leanna Lenee, planning such a sweet surprise for him was heartwarming, many fans have continued to troll the couple.A fan took to X and wrote, “Had to make a business decision to insure her money😂😂😂”, while another fan wrote, “How many years yall give this marriage?”However, some fans have also supported Leanna Lenee. A fan wrote, “Leanne is so Great as a Partner for Travis❤️🙏 This is so Dope 😎”, while another fan wrote, “What a wonderful surprise. Great job Leanna!”Travis Hunter and his fiancee, Leanna Lenee, have gone through a pretty tough time in the last few months. Many fans have brutally trolled the couple as people believed that Leanna Lenee is dating Travis Hunter for his wealth; a claim that has been constantly denied by the couple.Travis Hunter has also defended his girlfriend a number of times but it all fell on deaf ears and the couple had to keep themselves away from social media until things cooled down. Travis Hunter had deactivated his Instagram account for a few days while his fiancee, Leanna Lenee, has to make her social media accounts private.Also Read: "She wants to start a family": Taylor Swift hopes for marriage but Travis Kelce eyes another NFL season
Article Summary: Travis hunter and his fiancee, leanna lenee, have been brutally trolled in the past. Their new video has raised some eyebrows among their fans. Many fans have continued to troll the couple as people believed that leannalenee is dating travis hunter for his wealth; a claim that has been constantly denied.

Article Title: “I'm not okay": Pittsburgh Penguins' recent post about Sidney Crosby Marc-André Fleury and Evgeni Malkin sends fans into a frenzy
Article Text:
Image via Gene J. Puskar/AP

Pittsburgh Penguins’ Recent Post Has Fans Emotional About The Bond Between Sidney Crosby, Marc-André Fleury And Evgeni Malkin



With the Pittsburgh Penguins defeating the Minnesota Wild today, it could have been the last that Penguins’ Sidney Crosby faced Marc-André Fleury of the Minnesota Wild. While the captain of the Pittsburgh Penguins, Sidney Crosby, has fondly spoken about facing Marc-André Fleury hours before the match, a recent post made by the Pittsburgh Penguins on their social media has sent fans into a frenzy.The Pittsburgh Penguins’ posted a picture of Sidney Crosby, Marc-André Fleury and Evgeni Malkin posing for a picture together. The caption of the picture reads as, “Once teammates, always family ❤️” and this beautiful picture has sent fans into a frenzy.A fan commented, “The 3headed monster, and Tanger should have been in this photo, too! Love our boys!”, while another fan wrote, “They basically grew up in the NHL together!! Band of Brothers!”A third fan wrote, “CRYIN IN THE CLUB RN ADMIN 😭😭😭”, while another user wrote, “How ironic that these are the 2 that scored on him for his final game 😭🌸”At a recent media availability, the captain of the Pittsburgh Penguins, Sidney Crosby, remembered Marc-André Fleury fondly and spoke about him. He said, "You reflect a bit ... He's had an amazing career. And it was fun having an opportunity to play with him for a big chunk of it."Sidney Crosby added, "You try to compete like any other game, but you also appreciate these moments when you realize they might not happen again."He also spoke about defeating the Minnesota Wild and said, “Yeah, it would be nice to have bragging rights there. That’s always the goal.”Marc-André Fleury, one of the most popular and talented players in the NHL, started his career with the Pittsburgh Penguins in 2003 and stayed with the team for fourteen years, till 2017. In 2017, Marc-André Fleury moved to the Vegas Golden Knights and stayed with them until 2021 when he was traded to the Chicago Blackhawks.Marc-André Fleury spent a year with the Chicago Blackhawks and by 2022, he had joined the Minnesota Wild. His bond with Sidney Crosby is looked up to and fans are pretty emotional about it currently. Many fans have urged Marc-André Fleury to not retire this year, but he has not reacted to it yet and has not issued a statement regarding this.Also Read: Boston Bruins "worked" with Brad Marchand in trade decision to the Florida Panthers but fans remain furious
Article Summary: The pittsburgh penguins posted a picture of sidney crosby, marc-andré fleury and evgeni malkin posing for a picture together. The caption of the picture reads as, “once teammates, always family ❤️” and this beautiful picture has sent fans into a frenzy. A recent media availability, the captain of the pittsburgh penguins, sidney crosby said, "you reflect a bit...

Article Title: Dwyane Wade takes side with LeBron James amid his feud with Stephen A. Smith involving Bronny James
Article Text: LeBron James confronted Stephen A. Smith courtside over criticism of his son's NBA career. Dwyane Wade supported James, saying family should be off-limits. Smith suggested the confrontation should have been private and clarified his comments were about LeBron's decisions, not Bronny. LeBron's agent downplayed the controversy, emphasizing maturity in handling disputes.
Article Summary: Lebron james confronted stephen a. smith courtside over criticism of his son's nba career. Smith suggested the confrontation should have been private and clarified his comments were about lebron's decisions. Lebron's agent downplayed the controversy, emphasizing maturity in handling disputes.

Article Title: Paul Heyman Shares Special Message After WWE RAW Return Assisting CM Punk
Article Text:
(Image Via WWE)

Paul Heyman shares special message after WWE RAW comeback

Roman Reigns spears CM Punk in front of Paul Heyman: Raw highlights, March 10, 2025

Also Read

The Tribal Chief Roman Reigns took WWE fans by surprise when he entered the Monday Night RAW event on March 10, 2025, after a hiatus. The OTC made a shocking comeback after he last appeared in the Royal Rumble 2025 match. Roman Reigns joined the steel cage match between Seth Rollins and CM Punk , who was also accompanied by The Wiseman of WWE, Paul Heyman .Reigns made a sudden entry at the RAW event, where Seth Rollins and CM Punk were in an intense feud in a steel cage match. The OTC joined and attacked them both. Reigns then pulled out Rollins of the steel cage and attacked CM Punk, gifting Rollins the win. In the event, Roman Reign was not the only superstar who joined the duo during the intense steel cage feud. CM Punk was also joined by his friend, Paul Heyman too.Paul Heyman was present on WWE RAW assisting CM Punk, but the OTC did not spare Punk and attacked him viciously inside the ring, pinning him down ultimately with a spear in the end.After making his comeback alongside Roman Reigns on the latest edition of WWE RAW, WWE’s Wiseman, Paul Heyman has shared a special message on his social media handle sharing his excitement.Heyman could not hold back his emotions after returning to the company’s event. The Wiseman was seen enjoying his return and posted the same on his X handle. The video showed a lounge where he and his teammates were probably enjoying after the WWE event.The video also had a caption written as: “When the undisputed No.1 lounge in Billionaire's Row stays open late just for you and your #L4L crew! #KingOfNewYork (... and everywhere else)! #Looking4Larry - We're not just NYC's most bada** agency, we set the trends for the Roaring 2020s.”By the caption, Heyman meant that they are NYC’s most popular agency and they set the trends for the 2020s for the company. However, this feud between Seth Rollins, Punk, and Roman Reigns could lead to a triple-threat match that will be set by the company at the upcoming WrestleMania 41 As per reports, Paul Heyman has currently been guiding Bron Breakker. This was confirmed by WWE Chief Content Officer Paul “Triple H” Levesque. He mentioned that one of the rising names sitting under Paul Heyman’s learning tree is the WWE Champion Bron Breakker. Levesque also told The Hollywood Reporter about Breakker, “He’s a young guy, incredibly athletic, great character, he’s a sponge.”
Article Summary: Roman reigns took wwe fans by surprise when he entered the monday night raw event on march 10, 2025, after a hiatus. The otc made a shocking comeback after he last appeared in the royal rumble 2025 match. Roman reigns joined the steel cage match between seth rollins and cm punk, who was also accompanied by the wiseman of wwe, paul heyman.

Article Title: "A disappointment": Yankees star Paul Goldschmidt reveals disappointed part of playing for Cardinals
Article Text:
Aug 10, 2024; Kansas City, Missouri, USA; St. Louis Cardinals first baseman Paul Goldschmidt (46) reacts during the fifth inning against the Kansas City Royals at Kauffman Stadium. Mandatory Credit: Jay Biggerstaff-Imagn Images / Jay Biggerstaff-Imagn Images

Paul Goldschmidt opened up about his time at Cardinals

Paul Goldschmidt with Meredith Marakovits

"I loved it there. I’ve got nothing bad to say about the organization—the fans were amazing, everything was great. We had high expectations, just like we do here in New York. We wanted to win a World Series, and we didn’t do it, so that will always stick with me as a disappointment. But so many great memories and just a great time overall."

Details into Paul Goldschmidt's impressive MLB career

It has been more than a decade since Paul Goldschmidt played in the league. Over his career, Goldschmidt has played with three teams. Currently signed with the New York Yankees , Goldschmidt was previously playing with the St. Louis Cardinals for six long seasons. Goldschmidt does not have many complaints about his time at the Cardinals, but just one.On Sunday, Paul Goldschmidt got the chance to be face-to-face with his former team, the St. Louis Cardinals, who ended up winning the Spring Training game against the New York Yankees by 6-5. Before the Yankees vs Cardinals clash, Goldschmidt was interviewed by YES Network.During one of the segments of the interview, Paul Goldschmidt recapped his time playing for the Cardinals. While Goldschmidt has no complaints about his time at the Cardinals, the first baseman was disappointed about just one thing. Talking about it in detail, Goldschmidt said:Paul Goldschmidt started his MLB career with the Arizona Diamondbacks in 2009 when the team signed him for $95,000. In 2011, the Diamondbacks and Goldschmidt agreed upon a pre-arbitration agreement worth $414,000, followed by another pre-arbitration deal in 2012 worth $452,000.In 2013, Goldschmidt signed one more pre-arbitration deal with the Diamondbacks worth $500,000, followed by an extension worth $52 Million for 5 years. In 2020, Goldschmidt signed a 5-year-long contract worth $130 Million with the St. Louis Cardinals, which came with an average salary of $26 Million and a signing bonus of $20 Million.In December 2024, Paul Goldschmidt agreed to a 1-year deal with the New York Yankees, which came with $12.5 Million as guaranteed money. According to the deal, Goldschmidt is set to become a free agent in 2026. As of his last season's stats, Goldschmidt scored 2056 hits with a total of 362 home runs, an RBI of 1187, and a total of 2056 hits.Considering the fact that Paul Goldschmidt has known to have a great legacy with both the teams he has played in his career, there's a good chance that the Yankees will retain him for a few more years. What do you think?
Article Summary: Paul goldschmidt opened up about his time at the st. louis cardinals. The first baseman is currently signed with the new york yankees. Goldsch schmidt started his mlb career with the arizona diamondbacks in 2009. As of his last season's stats, he scored 2056 hits with a total of 362 home runs.

Article Title: Jimmy Butler and Steve Kerr Exchange Heated Words After Controversial Late-Game Shot in Warriors' Win Over Portland Trail Blazers
Article Text:
Image Via Getty

Steve Kerr Explains Why He Told Jimmy Butler to Break NBA’s Unwritten Rule

Jimmy Butler’s Triple-Double Overshadowed by Controversial Shot

Jimmy Butler single handedly forces a shot clock violation

Gary Payton II Scores Career-High 26 Points to Lead Golden State Warriors to Victory

What should have been a straightforward win for the Warriors turned into a mess after the game. Jimmy Butler 's triple-double was overshadowed by a last-second shot that really upset the Portland Trail Blazers players — and it looked like it got under Butler's skin too. A video from after the game showed a tense moment between him and coach Steve Kerr , who later revealed he was the one who told Butler to take that shot. Here’s the whole story behind that unexpected twist.As the clock wound down in the Warriors' 130-120 win over the Portland Trail Blazers, Jimmy Butler was in a bit of a bind. With Golden State comfortably ahead and only a few ticks left, he had to choose between holding the ball or taking a shot. Usually, teams would just let the clock run out in these moments. But after a quick glance at Steve Kerr on the sideline, Butler decided to take an open jumper, which ruffled a few feathers among the Trail Blazers players.Footage from after the game showed Jimmy Butler frustrated during a brief but intense talk with Steve Kerr. Kerr later explained his reasoning, saying, “I told him, we don't do shot clock violations. If there’s a shot clock differential, we always shoot.” Kerr’s firm stance on this philosophy put Butler in a tricky situation, even though he seemed a little reluctant on the court.Butler had a standout performance that evening! He scored 15 points, pulled down 10 rebounds, and tallied 10 assists, marking his second triple-double this season and his first as a Warrior. His previous triple-double was on December 16 while he was with the Miami Heat. The Warriors are sitting pretty with a 12-1 record when Butler plays, highlighting his significant role in their success.While all this is happening, Stephen Curry keeps shining this season, hitting five 3-pointers and bringing his total to 251. This is his 11th season with 250+ threes, which is an NBA record. He’s just two 3-pointers away from being the first player to hit 4,000 career triples.Even with the fuss going on, the Warriors' depth was a key factor in their victory. Gary Payton II had an impressive night, scoring a career-high 26 points and tying his record with four 3-pointers. Buddy Hield also made his mark with six 3-pointers and 20 points, showing off the Warriors' strong offensive lineup.The arguments between Jimmy Butler and Steve Kerr after the game definitely caught some attention, but it doesn't take away from how well the Warriors played. With Stephen Curry on the verge of hitting a major milestone and Butler stepping up with his all-around skills, Golden State is proving they're a force to be reckoned with.Also Read - Shai Gilgeous-Alexander vs Nikola Jokic: Who Truly Deserves the 2025 NBA MVP? Now, everyone’s looking forward to Curry’s upcoming matchup against the Sacramento Kings , where he could sink his 4,000th three-pointer and make NBA history .
Article Summary: Golden state warriors beat portland trail blazers 130-120. Jimmy butler scored 15 points, pulled down 10 rebounds, and tallied 10 assists. It was his second triple-double this season and his first as a warrior. Steve kerr later revealed he told butler to take that shot.

Article Title: Why Did Roman Reigns Join Seth Rollins Instead of Jey Uso on WWE RAW?
Article Text:
(Image Via Getty Images)

Why did Roman Reigns choose Seth Rollins and CM Punk over Jey Uso?

Roman Reigns spears CM Punk in front of Paul Heyman: Raw highlights, March 10, 2025

Also Read:

Superstar Roman Reigns made headlines when he returned to WWE on the March 10 episode of Monday Night RAW. The OTC joined the steel cage match between Seth "Freakin" Rollins and CM Punk held in the Madison Square Garden in New York.Reigns took everyone by surprise when he entered during the feud. During the steel cage match, Reigns joined Seth Rollins and CM Punk and attacked them both. The OTC then pulled out Rollins of the steel cage and continued attacking. Later, he went on to attack CM Punk, who was joined by his friend Paul Heyman, with a vicious spear, ultimately gifting Rollins the win.This action led everyone to wonder why the OTC did not join his cousin Jey Uso who locked horns with Grayson Waller in the singles match and then later attacked by Austin Theory and Gunther. Let's find out the possible reason for his decision to not join and help Jey Uso, but his arch-rival Seth Rollins.During the main event, Roman Reigns made a comeback after his hiatus after the Royal Rumble 2025. The OTC entered the RAW to intervene in the steel cage match between Seth Rollins and CM Punk.The Tribal Chief came back with vengeance in his mind, after Rollins had previously taken him out with two stomps at the Royal Rumble match. This incident added speculation that the company is possibly planning a triple-threat match between Reigns, Seth Rollins, and CM Punk at the upcoming WrestleMania 41 Meanwhile, Jey Uso, who happens to be Reigns' cousin, also participated in the same event. During the WWE RAW match, Jey Uso locked horns with Grayson Waller. Though Uso won the match against Waller, the feud did not end there. He was subsequently attacked by Austin Theory and Gunther.Similarly, fans are wondering why Reigns did not join the bandwagon to help Jey Uso from Gunther and Theory, given the fact that the Tribal Chief has resolved all issues with Jey Uso.The possible reason behind it may be the company's decision to not make a crossover between them. It could have happened that the OTC did not reach the venue and had different timelines in their appearance.Besides, the Triple-H creative team has something different in their plan about the upcoming triple-threat match. Had Reigns joined Jey Uso during the feud, the storyline development about the triple-threat match would have been different from what has been decided by the WWE management.
Article Summary: Roman reigns returned to wwe on the march 10 episode of monday night raw. The otc joined the steel cage match between seth rollins and cm punk. Reigns took everyone by surprise when he entered during the feud. This action led everyone to wonder why the otc did not join his cousin jey uso.

Article Title: Trevor Bauer disses Diamondbacks for rejecting his signing with a 'too expensive' reason tag
Article Text:
Dodgers pitcher Trevor Bauer reacts to fans booing him as he leaves the game during the seventh inning of a 2-1 win over the San Francisco Giants on Friday. (Thearon W. Henderson / Getty Images)

Trevor Bauer opens up about negotiations with Diamondbacks

"The same pattern exists. Team gives a reason they 'can’t' sign me, I very quickly propose a solution that would solve the problem completely, and they scramble to find another reason why they can’t."

"Like the Diamondbacks - who told me I was 'too expensive' when I was asking for league minimum with no incentives. The truth is, these reasons aren’t the actual reason they can’t sign me."

Trevor Bauer hasn't played in the MLB since 2021, and the former Los Angeles Dodgers star blames the Arizona Diamondbacks for his long distance from the league. Bauer recently talked about his Diamondbacks negotiations and blamed the team for stopping his MLB comeback. Bauer claimed that he hadn't asked for something too much but league minimum.On Monday, Trevor Bauer took to his X account to share a tweet in which he replied to a fan who blamed his social media presence for teams rejecting his signing. Bauer claimed that he has been ready to give complete access to all his social media profiles, to any team who signs him.However, according to Trevor Bauer, social media access hasn't been the reason why he remains unsigned in the MLB. Bauer explained his take by straight away calling out the Arizona Diamondbacks for ditching his signing, with an unrealistic reason. Talking about the details into same, Bauer said:According to Trevor Bauer, the Diamondbacks found him "too expensive" to be hired. However, Bauer explained that he wasn't asking for anything out of the box but "league minimum." Concluding his statement, the ex-Dodgers star expressed:Trevor Bauer was drafted into the league by the Arizona Diamondbacks in 2011 and stayed with the team for two seasons. During his signing, Bauer signed a rookie contract worth $4.45 Million, which came with an average salary of $1.11 Million and a signing bonus of $3.4 Million.In 2013, Trevor Bauer joined the Cleveland Indians for a $1.94 Million contract and stayed with the team till 2019. From 2019 to 2020, Bauer stayed with the Cincinnati Reds . In 2021, Bauer signed with the Los Angeles Dodgers, on a $102 Million contract and went free agent in 2024. After going undrafted in the MLB, Trevor Bauer decided to play in the Japanese Central League and has been with the Yokohama DeNA BayStars since 2024. Do you think there's any chance of Bauer to return to the MLB? Share your take in the comment section.
Article Summary: Trevor bauer hasn't played in the mlb since 2021. The former los angeles dodgers star blames the arizona diamondbacks for his long distance from the league. Bauer claimed that he has been ready to give complete access to all his social media profiles, to any team who signs him.

Article Title: Jeanie Buss opens up on the Los Angeles Lakers' bold move to acquire Luka Doncic: "It was the Mavericks who initiated the discussion"
Article Text:
Image via AP Photos

Brenda Song praises Linda Rambis as a hero while Jeanie Buss reflects on the Lakers' bold Luka Doncic trade Jeanie Buss, the owner of the Los Angeles Lakers , recently collaborated with Netflix to create a comedy series titled "Running Point," which offers a fictionalized portrayal of her journey as an NBA team owner. The show features actress Kate Hudson in the role of Isla Gordon, a character inspired by Buss.According to actress Brenda Song, who stars in the series, Buss approached Mindy Kaling, creator of "The Office," about five years ago with the idea. Buss, known for her sense of humor, preferred a comedic take on her experiences, believing her life was so extraordinary that it lent itself to comedy.The first season of "Running Point" has been well-received, earning a 7.5 rating on IMDb and a 78% approval rating on Rotten Tomatoes. Song also mentioned that her character is loosely based on Lakers' executive Linda Rambis, whom she admires greatly.In real life, Buss recently made headlines with a significant move for the Lakers: the acquisition of NBA superstar Luka Doncic from the Dallas Mavericks . This blockbuster trade sent shockwaves through the basketball community, as it involved exchanging Doncic for Anthony Davis, a key player in the Lakers' 2020 championship win."I knew this trade would be big in the NBA, but I didn’t fully realize just how globally popular Luka Doncic is," Buss admitted."While we’re excited to have him on the Lakers, parting ways with Anthony Davis was not easy. We weren’t actively looking to trade him it was actually the Mavericks who initiated the discussions. In the end, it was a tough decision, but one that ultimately made sense for both teams.Doncic, who had been with the Mavericks since joining the NBA, was reportedly shocked by the trade. He had envisioned spending his entire career in Dallas and expressed his surprise and sadness in a letter to Mavericks fans. He thanked them for their unwavering support and acknowledged the difficulty of the sudden change.The trade also had significant implications for the Mavericks. Anthony Davis, who joined Dallas as part of the exchange, faced challenges early on, including injuries that limited his ability to contribute immediately.Also read: Ben Affleck’s 'Air' Captured Michael Jordan's Legacy Without Featuring the NBA Legend On-Screen Jeanie Buss is excited about Luka Doncic joining the Lakers. She pointed out that his jersey number, 77, is unique because no other Laker has worn it before. She also hinted that Doncic could be a key player for the team for many years and might even have his jersey retired one day, just like other Lakers legends.
Article Summary: Jeanie buss, the owner of the los angeles lakers, recently collaborated with netflix to create a comedy series titled "running point" the show features actress kate hudson in the role of isla gordon, a character inspired by buss. In real life, buss recently made headlines with the acquisition of nba superstar luka doncic from the dallas mavericks.

Article Title: “Death of a relationship”: Taylor Swift allegedly fears Travis Kelce’s retirement decision could create challenges in their relationship
Article Text:
Image via GC

Taylor Swift is said to be grappling with issues regarding how Travis Kelce's professional decisions

Taylor Swift is said to be grappling with issues regarding how Travis Kelce's professional decisions could affect their relationship. According to sources, she is unsure of what the future holds, especially since he is weighing whether to keep playing or retire from the NFL. There are concerns that his possible retirement could lead to major shifts in their dynamic, and Swift is worried about how it could affect their connection.Taylor Swift is reported to be grappling with fears about how Travis Kelce's choices concerning his football career will impact their relationship. RadarOnline reports that the pop star is anxious about the uncertainty that lies ahead, especially as Kelce considers extending for one more season.An insider told that Swift is concerned about how their relationship dynamic will shift if Kelce chooses to retire from the NFL. The adjustment from his rigorous athletic life to a new way of living could present unexpected challenges, making her nervous about how they will handle this new chapter in their lives together.“If Travis does retire, it could drastically change his and Taylor’s lives together. He would be around far more, and who knows—she may start to get sick of him!” the source said. The couple is experiencing a mix of feelings, including a desire to spend more time together, and concerns about potential challenges. The insider noted, “They both know this can spell the death of a relationship.”Adding to the uncertainty, Marca revealed that Taylor Swift was greatly affected by the backlash she received at the Super Bowl, where she was booed by parts of the audience. What made things worse for her was that Travis Kelce did not publicly defend her at the time, which apparently left her exposed and vulnerable.Also Read: Travis Kelce's beau Taylor Swift sets historic streaming record on International Women's Day, surpassing 7.2 billion Spotify streams While Travis Kelce considers the future of his football career, Taylor Swift is reportedly becoming more and more worried about what it might hold for their relationship in the future. His choice is no longer merely a sports decision—it's one that weighs heavily on his emotions and could be a defining factor in how their relationship continues to develop. The not knowing of what is to come has only fueled Swift's fears, which makes this the critical juncture for their relationship and lives.
Article Summary: Taylor swift is said to be grappling with issues regarding how travis kelce's professional decisions could affect their relationship. According to sources, she is unsure of what the future holds, especially since he is weighing whether to keep playing or retire from the nfl.

Article Title: "They wanted him out": Boston Bruins fans reconsider their stance on the trade of Brad Marchand to Florida Panthers
Article Text:
Image via Bob DeChiara-Imagn Images

Fans Support The Boston Bruins’ Decision To Trade Brad Marchand To The Florida Panthers



Brad Marchand, the former captain of the Boston Bruins, recently got traded to the Florida Panthers and fans are still in shock about it. Recently, former NHL players Paul Bissonnette and Ryan Whitney spoke about how the Boston Bruins were unwilling to settle on an amount with Brad Marchand, which resulted in his trade to the Florida Panthers. But fans dont agree with this.On a recent episode of the Spittin Chiclets podcast, Paul Bissonnetee said, “It was offered exactly what he's making now for three years…and Marchand's camp wanted seven and a half. And Marchand had a meeting with Don Sweeney…and they would not come up on their offer. I thought that that was insane. You wouldn't give Brad Marchand the same amount that you paid Lindholm. That's crazy to me.”However, fans feel otherwise about the whole situation; a fan commented, “dude, they wanted him out... its that simple”, while another fan wrote, “They didn't like his leadership, money was not the problem.”A third fan wrote, “Hes almost 37, frequently injured lately (double hip surgery) & slowing down. 16 yrs in Boston or not, you can't write him a blank check & handcuff a drowning team longer. Bergy, Chara, even Krejci took less at the end to build a better team. Seems like Marchy wouldn't do that”.Another user wrote, “He’s not worth even 5M a year at 37 years old 😂”, while a sixth one noted, “Send me the list of players over 37 that got that high an AAV for 3 years. I’ll wait. We will see what he gets on the open market. I think he will be disappointed”.Brad Marchand’s trade to the Florida Panthers has sent shockwaves across the league. Many fans have slammed the Boston Bruins’ team as well as Don Sweeney for deciding to trade Brad Marchand.However, at a recent interview, Brad Marchand, the former captain of the Boston Bruins have hinted at a possible return to his former team in July. He said, “I know it didn’t come together now. Can things change down the road? Potentially, but that’s to be seen. I’m sure we’ll have a conversation down the road, but I don’t know where that goes.”Also Read: "He's not good enough": Connor McDavid’s frustration sparks debate over his leadership as Oilers struggle
Article Summary: Brad marchand, the former captain of the boston bruins, recently got traded to the florida panthers. Former nhl players paul bissonnette and ryan whitney spoke about how the bruins were unwilling to settle on an amount with brad marchand. But fans feel otherwise about the whole situation; one wrote, “dude, they wanted him out... its that simple”

Article Title: Mike Williams reunites with Chargers on a one-year deal to strengthen wide receiver lineup
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

Mike Williams Makes a Comeback to the Chargers on a One-Year Deal



Mike Williams is set to make a return to the Los Angeles Chargers after spending just one season away from the team. According to NFL Network's Tom Pelissero, Williams has agreed to a one-year contract worth up to $6 million. This reunion marks a significant moment for both Williams and the Chargers, as the team looks to strengthen its offense after a challenging season.The Chargers originally selected Williams with the seventh overall pick in the 2017 NFL Draft. He spent his first seven seasons with the team, establishing himself as a reliable target for the Chargers' offense. However, Williams left Los Angeles last offseason, signing with the New York Jets in a move that was expected to elevate his career alongside Aaron Rodgers. Unfortunately, that plan unraveled quickly when Rodgers suffered a season-ending injury. Williams was then traded to the Pittsburgh Steelers in November, where he finished the 2024 season.Williams struggled to make a significant impact during his time with the Jets and Steelers. Over 18 games last season, he managed just 21 receptions for 298 yards and one touchdown. Interestingly, that lone touchdown came during his debut with the Steelers — a game-winning catch that briefly hinted at the playmaking ability he had displayed with the Chargers in previous years.Williams's last full season with the Chargers in 2023 was cut short after he suffered a torn ACL in Week 3, forcing him to miss the rest of the season. However, his contributions to the Chargers' offense before the injury were undeniable. He led the team in receiving yards during both the 2021 (1,146 yards) and 2022 (895 yards) seasons, showcasing his ability to be a dominant downfield threat.The Chargers' decision to bring Williams back reflects their urgent need for experienced pass catchers to support quarterback Justin Herbert. The team's receiving corps faced significant setbacks last season, prompting new general manager Joe Hortiz to make adjustments. Williams’s return offers Herbert a familiar and reliable target, which could help stabilize the offense. Despite his struggles last season, Williams remains a physical receiver who can use his size to make contested catches — a skill set that could be valuable in the red zone and on critical third downs.While Williams’s stock may have dipped following his disappointing stint with the Jets and Steelers, a return to a familiar system with Herbert under center could be exactly what he needs to rejuvenate his career. Ladd McConkey is expected to lead the receiving unit, but Williams will likely compete with Quentin Johnson for snaps. With the Chargers also expected to add more weapons through the 2025 NFL Draft, Williams will have to prove he still has enough left in the tank to earn consistent playing time.Also Read: “Trade them and move on”: Former NFL star Robert Griffin III criticizes Cowboys' handling of Micah Parsons' contract negotiations Williams's return to the Chargers feels like a last chance to prove he can still be a difference-maker. If he can stay healthy and regain his form, he could provide a much-needed spark for the Chargers’ offense. His familiarity with Herbert and the offensive system gives him a strong foundation to bounce back and potentially make this comeback season one to remember.
Article Summary: Mike williams has agreed to a one-year contract with the los angeles chargers, according to nfl network's tom pelissero. The chargers originally selected williams with the seventh overall pick in the 2017 nfl draft. He spent his first seven seasons with the team, establishing himself as a reliable target for the chargers' offense.

Article Title: Tom Brady’s heart returns to his ‘True Love’ as Gisele Bündchen welcomes new baby and finds 'Freedom'
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

Tom Brady Focuses on His ‘True Love’ as Gisele Bündchen Finds Happiness with Newborn Arrival



Credit: Getty Images and Instagram

Tom Brady and Gisele Bündchen have moved on with their lives following their high-profile divorce in 2022. After 13 years of marriage, the former couple has gracefully adapted to their new realities, finding success and fulfillment in both their personal and professional lives. While Brady continues to thrive in the football world post-retirement, Bündchen has rediscovered her passion for modeling and found love again with her jiu-jitsu instructor, Joaquim Valente .Tom Brady’s love for football remains as intense as ever, even after retiring from the NFL . Since stepping away from the game, he has found success in his new role as Fox’s lead analyst. His insightful commentary and high-profile interviews, including a notable one with Patrick Mahomes, contributed to Fox's record-breaking 127.7 million viewers during the 2025 Super Bowl . Despite his busy schedule, Brady has maintained a balance between his professional commitments and fatherhood, ensuring that his children—Benjamin, Vivian, and Jack—remain a priority.Brady’s unwavering connection to football was highlighted when he shared an Instagram story showing him throwing a football with the caption, “true love.” This subtle yet powerful statement reflects that his passion for the game remains unchanged. Speaking on The Pivot Podcast in May 2024, Brady admitted that his motivation was never about winning titles but rather about the sheer joy of the game. “It was never to be a champion. I love just throwing the football. When I throw the football and I see that ball spiral out of my hands, I’m like, ‘Woo! Love that! You guys want to go to the beach? Let’s throw the football. I’ll have a hell of a time. We would laugh, we would probably play for three hours out there,’” Brady shared, underscoring how football remains a fundamental part of his identity.Gisele Bündchen has also moved forward gracefully. The supermodel, who once described her divorce as “the death of her dream,” resumed her modeling career in March 2023 after a six-month break. In February 2024, a source close to Bündchen confirmed her relationship with her jiu-jitsu instructor, Joaquim Valente, to Page Six. The couple has been spotted vacationing together in Costa Rica, often accompanied by their daughter, Vivian, reflecting a harmonious and supportive family dynamic.Bündchen has openly spoken about the emotional challenges following her split from Brady. In a 2023 interview with Vanity Fair, she reflected on the complexities of their relationship, stating, “When I was 26 years old and he was 29, we met, we wanted a family, we wanted things together. As time goes by, we realize that we just wanted different things, and now we have a choice to make. That doesn’t mean you don’t love the person.” Bündchen’s candid acknowledgment highlights the mutual respect that remains between them despite their separation.Motherhood continues to be central to Bündchen’s life. She recently welcomed a baby with Valente, though the details have been kept private. To relax during her postpartum period, Bündchen was spotted enjoying a yacht trip in Miami with Valente in March 2025. Her recent comments about feeling “like she lived in Tom [Brady’s] shadow for a long time” suggest that she has now reclaimed her independence and sense of self. Bündchen has also embraced a more balanced lifestyle, focusing on self-care and mindfulness.While Brady and Bündchen have taken different paths, they remain committed to co-parenting their children with mutual respect. Brady’s acknowledgment of Bündchen in his Mother’s Day Instagram story in May 2024 reflects the amicable nature of their post-divorce relationship. Despite their romantic separation, both have prioritized maintaining a stable and loving environment for their children.Also Read: Gisele Bündchen enjoys newfound ‘freedom’ with Joaquim Valente after years in Tom Brady’s 'Shadow': Report Their ability to find happiness and fulfillment independently while maintaining a respectful relationship post-divorce serves show their maturity and shared values. Brady continues to dedicate himself to football and his children, while Bündchen has discovered a new chapter of love and personal growth.
Article Summary: Tom brady and gisele bündchen have moved on with their lives following their high-profile divorce in 2022. The former couple has gracefully adapted to their new realities, finding success and fulfillment in both their personal and professional lives. Brady’s love for football remains as intense as ever, even after retiring from the nfl.

Article Title: How NBA Legend LeBron James Built His $1.2 Billion Net Worth and Became One of the Richest Athletes in the World
Article Text:
LA Lakers' star LeBron James (Image via Getty)

LeBron James' NBA Salary



Endorsements by King James



Investments by LeBron James



Real Estate Investments



Philanthropy by King James



The Los Angeles Lakers star player LeBron James is one of the biggest names in the world of basketball. The NBA star has a staggering net worth of $1.2 billion, making him the first active NBA player to reach billionaire status. But how did the King build his empire? Let's dive in!LeBron James earns a whopping $48.7 million per year from his NBA salary, making him one of the highest-paid players in the league. Throughout his career, he's earned nearly $480 million solely from his salary. And being an active player, it will keep adding to his fortune. King James' endorsement deals are other significant contributors to his wealth. He's partnered with major brands like Nike, PepsiCo, and McDonald's, earning over $900 million (pretax) from these deals. His lifetime contract with Nike is worth over $1 billion.LeBron James' investments have been savvy and lucrative. He's invested in companies like Fenway Sports Group, SpringHill Company, Beats by Dre, Blaze Pizza, Tonal, Lyft, and Liverpool FC, earning millions from these ventures. He continues to earn from his investments in heaps, adding to his already massive fortune.The LA Lakers star's real estate holdings are impressive, with properties in Los Angeles, Miami, and Akron. He owns about $80 million worth of real estate and is known for his lucrative investment strategies. His Miami Waterfront mansion in the Coconut Grove neighborhood was bought for $9 million in 2010, which he then sold in 2015 for $13.4 million. He also bought an estate in Ohio in 2003, which he purchased for $2.1 million. He has also bought three properties in Los Angeles: two in Beverly Hills, one of which he sold, and a third in Brentwood. LeBron James' commitment to giving back is admirable. He founded the LeBron James Family Foundation in 2004, which focuses on helping young people in his hometown of Akron, Ohio. The foundation's mission is to support at-risk youth and families by offering programs, resources, and mentorship to help them succeed in school and beyond. Its work is guided by LeBron's personal experiences growing up in Akron and his commitment to giving back to his community.The empire LeBron James has built over the years is a testament to his hard work, smart business decisions, and dedication to his craft. He's an inspiration to many, both on and off the court. Widely regarded as one of the greatest basketball players of all time, he has built an impressive portfolio that's contributed to his billionaire status immensely.Also Read: Dwyane Wade takes side with LeBron James amid his feud with Stephen A. Smith involving Bronny James
Article Summary: Lebron james has a net worth of $1.2 billion, making him the first active nba player to reach billionaire status. He earns $48.7 million per year from his nba salary. He's invested in companies like fenway sports group, springhill company, beats by dre, blaze pizza, tonal, lyft, and liverpool fc.

Article Title: Will Trae Young play tonight against the Charlotte Hornets? Latest update on the Atlanta Hawks star's injury report (March 12, 2025)
Article Text:
Is Trae Young playing tonight? (Image via Imagn)



Is Trae Young playing tonight? Atlanta Hawks injury report for tonight’s game against the Charlotte Hornets (March 12, 2025)

Hawks injury report March 12 (Image via NBA)

Trae Young’s impact on the Atlanta Hawks roster

When and where to watch Trae Young and the Hawks play tonight against the Charlotte Hornets (March 12, 2025)?

The Atlanta Hawks face uncertainty as star guard Trae Young is listed as questionable for their upcoming game against the Charlotte Hornets on Wednesday, March 12, due to a quadricep injury. Young’s potential absence could significantly impact the Hawks’ offense, as he leads the team with 23.8 points per game, ranking 18th in the NBA. Trae Young might be absent form tonight's match as he is listed as GTD on the team's injury report. The injury report reveals a challenging situation for the Atlanta Hawks, who are already without key players Kobe Bufkin and Jalen Johnson, both out for the season with shoulder injuries. Caris LeVert is also questionable with a finger issue, while Larry Nance Jr. remains sidelined with a knee injury. With five players on the injury list, Atlanta’s depth will be tested as they aim to improve their 31-34 record.Young’s contributions extend beyond scoring. He averages 10.5 assists per game, making him one of the league’s top playmakers. His ability to create opportunities for teammates like Onyeka Okongwu and Dyson Daniels has been crucial for the Atlanta Hawks , who rank fifth in the NBA with 117.3 points per game. However, their defensive struggles, allowing 119.7 points per game (27th in the league), have kept them from climbing the standings.The Hornets, meanwhile, are dealing with their own injury woes. Key players like Brandon Miller and Grant Williams are out for the season, while Jusuf Nurkic is questionable with a lower leg injury. Miles Bridges has been a bright spot for Charlotte, averaging 24.4 points and 8.3 rebounds over the last 20 games, but the team’s 16-48 record reflects their ongoing challenges.The game tips off at 7:30 p.m. ET at State Farm Arena in Atlanta and will be broadcast on FDSSE. Fans can also stream the matchup on Fubo, though regional restrictions may apply.As the Hawks prepare for this critical Eastern Conference showdown, all eyes will be on Trae Young’s status. His presence on the court could be the difference-maker in a game that holds significant implications for Atlanta’s playoff hopes.With the regular season winding down, the Hawks can ill afford to lose their star player for an extended period. Fans will be eagerly awaiting updates as game day approaches.
Article Summary: Atlanta hawks guard trae young is listed as questionable for their game against the charlotte hornets (march 12, 2025) young leads the team with 23.8 points per game, ranking 18th in the nba. Caris levert is also questionable with a finger issue, while larry nance jr. remains sidelined with a knee injury.

Article Title: Mickey Arthur: 'Pakistan is its worst enemy' Former coach backs Jason Gillespie after ‘clown’ jab at Aaqib Javed
Article Text:
Mickey Arthur (Photo by Gareth Copley/Getty Images)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Champions Return: Rohit, Hardik, Shreyas, Gambhir return after India's title triumph

NEW DELHI: Pakistan cricket has once again found itself in the middle of controversy and chaos following its first-round exit from the Champions Trophy 2025 — a tournament they were hosting on home soil after 29 years.The disappointment has not only triggered fan outrage but also exposed deep divisions among past and present coaching figures. Mickey Arthur , who led Pakistan during one of their more successful white-ball phases, was brutally honest in his criticism. Speaking to talkSport, Arthur said, “I love this quote, to be brutally honest. Jason Gillespie is a wonderful coach, wonderful man. Pakistan cricket just continues to shoot itself in the foot. It is its worst enemy.”Arthur believes Pakistan had made the right moves by appointing Jason Gillespie and Gary Kirsten to helm the red-ball and white-ball squads, respectively.However, he expressed regret at the ongoing instability that continues to plague the system. “There are so many good players; they’ve got the resources now; there's so much young talent. They have incredible skill. And yet, it's still so chaotic. It's really disappointing to see.”In a sharp rebuttal to Aaqib Javed’s comments blaming Pakistan’s recent struggles on “too many changes”, Gillespie accused the newly appointed coach of trying to “undermine them” and even called Javed a “clown.”Arthur echoed those concerns, pointing to deeper issues in Pakistan’s cricketing structure. “They had got some really good coaches who could take them forward. But then that machine that works in Pakistan just keeps undermining, and agendas are driven in the media,” he said.ALSO SEE: Jason Gillespie calls Pakistan's Aaqib Javed a 'clown' “It's a jungle out there and I feel desperately sorry for Gary and Jason. There's no doubt in my mind that they were undermined… it's to the detriment of the players and ultimately to the detriment of Pakistan cricket.”In what seems like a major shake-up, both Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan have been dropped from the upcoming five-match T20I series against New Zealand.
Article Summary: Pakistan were knocked out of the champions trophy in the first round. Mickey arthur believes pakistan had made the right moves by appointing jason gillespie and gary kirsten to helm the red-ball and white-ball squads. However, he expressed regret at the ongoing instability that continues to plague the system.

Article Title: MS Dhoni, Rishabh Pant sing their hearts out to 'Tu Jaane Na' at 'sangeet' ceremony
Article Text:
MS Dhoni, Rishabh Pant sing their hearts out (Screengrab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Champions Return: Rohit, Hardik, Shreyas, Gambhir return after India's title triumph

NEW DELHI: A heartwarming video featuring former Indian skipper MS Dhoni and star wicketkeeper-batter Rishabh Pant has taken the internet by storm.The two cricketers were seen singing along to the soulful Bollywood hit ‘Tu Jaane Na’ during a lively sangeet ceremony, much to the delight of fans and attendees alike.The star-studded celebration, held in Dehradun, saw several big names from Indian cricket setting the stage ablaze.While an earlier video of Dhoni and Raina dancing to ‘Dama Dam Mast Qalandar’ had already gone viral, the latest clip captures a more emotional and melodic moment as Dhoni, his wife Sakshi and Pant belt out ‘Tu Jaane Na’ with full heart.Watch:The ceremony was part of the wedding festivities of Rishabh's sister Sakshi Pant, who is tying the knot with businessman Ankit Chaudhary.Sakshi, a UK-educated social media personality known for her travel diaries and style, got engaged to Ankit in London last year, where Dhoni was also present.ALSO SEE: 'Thank You Pakistan': ICC lauds PCB for successful Champions Trophy 2025 Dhoni arrived at the celebrations with his wife, Sakshi, on Tuesday.Pant, fresh from India’s triumphant Champions Trophy 2025 campaign in Dubai, landed in India on Monday to join the family festivities.As fans relish these candid off-field moments, Dhoni is gearing up for another season with Chennai Super Kings , who face Mumbai Indians in their IPL 2025 opener on March 23.Pant, meanwhile, is set to lead the Lucknow Super Giants on March 24, in a high-octane clash against his former side, Delhi Capitals.
Article Summary: Ms dhoni and rishabh pant sing along to bollywood hit ‘tu jaane na’ the two cricketers were at a sangeet ceremony in dehradun. The ceremony was part of the wedding festivities of pant's sister. Dhoni is gearing up for another season with chennai super kings.

Article Title: 'ICC showed us the mirror': Kamran Akmal blasts PCB, says Pakistan didn't deserve stage presence at Champions Trophy ceremony
Article Text:
Virat Kohli receives the medal from ICC chairman Jay Shah. (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Champions Return: Rohit, Hardik, Shreyas, Gambhir return after India's title triumph

ICC defends protocol as controversy erupts over missing Pakistani representative

India win Champions Trophy title; Rohit Sharma confirms he's not retiring

Former Pakistan wicketkeeper-batter Kamran Akmal has stirred controversy with his blunt remarks regarding the absence of a representative from host nation Pakistan during the prize distribution ceremony of the recently concluded ICC Champions Trophy Akmal asserted that Pakistan did not "deserve" to have a representative on stage, citing the team's poor performance and lack of respect on the international stage."The ICC showed us the mirror," Akmal said on his YouTube channel. "The tournament's director (Sumair) was there. He was available, and why wasn't he in the ceremony? It is because we don't deserve to be there. We are not playing good cricket. Minow teams have shown us the mirror."He further expressed his disappointment with the current state of Pakistan cricket, adding, "No one discussed how Pakistan hosted the tournament. If we play such cricket, we will be treated like this. If you play for yourself, there will be no respect."The controversy erupted when Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) chief executive and Champions Trophy tournament director Sumair Ahmad Syed, who was present at the venue in Dubai, was not invited on stage for the final presentation. India clinched the Champions Trophy title for the third time by defeating New Zealand by four wickets, but Pakistan's absence from the ceremonial proceedings drew widespread criticism back home.The PCB lodged a formal complaint with the International Cricket Council (ICC), calling the incident "unacceptable." A PCB official was quoted by PTI as stating, "We have filed a formal complaint with the ICC as what happened is unacceptable to us."ALSO SEE: 'Pakistan is its worst enemy': Former coach Mickey Arthur backs Jason Gillespie after ‘clown’ jab at Aaqib Javed However, ICC sources have reportedly dismissed the complaint, indicating that the PCB is unlikely to receive a formal explanation or apology. The ICC maintained that the protocol did not mandate the presence of the tournament director on stage.Responding to the criticism, an ICC source explained to PTI, "If the PCB mandarins look up, even ICC CEO Geoff Allardice wasn't present on stage. The reason is protocol. Sumair Ahmed is an employee of the PCB and not an office-bearer. Also, please check when has a tournament director been on stage for presentation?"During the prize distribution ceremony, BCCI president Roger Binny presented white jackets to Indian players and handed medals to match officials, while ICC chairman Jay Shah presented the trophy to India skipper Rohit Sharma. Other dignitaries on stage included BCCI secretary Devajit Saikia and New Zealand Cricket CEO Roger Twose.
Article Summary: Former pakistan wicketkeeper-batter kamran akmal has stirred controversy with his blunt remarks regarding the absence of a representative from host nation pakistan. Akmal asserted that pakistan did not "deserve" to have a representative on stage, citing the team's poor performance and lack of respect.
